Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to the sale of bicycles with electric assist and electric scooters
Summary: Prohibits the sale of bicycles with electric assist and electric scooters unless they are equipped with a fireproof battery container for the safe storage of the battery used as the principal electric power source.
LawCode: Add ยง391-ccc, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the sale of bicycles with electric assist and electric scooters
